lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: I have done a lot of reading lately about the downside of foreign aid. All articles have pointed to microfinance in general (and kiva.org specifically) as a system that works. I love the reach that this gives me - I would otherwise have no way to learn about the needs around the world. Capitalizing on the awesome power of the collective makes changing the lives of others accessible to people of all walks of life. This is truly the best thing since sliced bread! :)
lender.occupational_info: I help the sales team at a legal technology consulting company.

lender.name: Casey Swenson
lender.loan_because:
One day a man was walking along the beach when he noticed a boy picking something up and gently throwing it into the ocean.
Approaching the boy, he asked, âWhat are you doing?â
The youth replied, âThrowing starfish back into the ocean. The surf is up and the tide is going out. If I donât throw them back, theyâll die.â
âSon,â the man said, âdonât you realize there are miles and miles of beach and hundreds of starfish? You canât make a difference!â
After listening politely, the boy bent down, picked up another starfish, and threw it back into the surf. Then, smiling at the man, he saidâ¦"I made a difference for that one.â

lender.occupational_info: i raise money for charity

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: I'm an independent business woman. I want to help other women achieve financial independence. A little money goes a long way. I also want to help people in Spanish-speaking countries have safe decent housing.
lender.occupational_info: I work with construction companies and help them with change to new accounting software

lender.name: Lionel
lender.loan_because: Helping others is kind of fun. Who knew?

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people, and I believe in love. I think that the former cannot occur without at least a little of the latter. I want to change the world but I'm still trying to find my place, Kiva is something small but it means a lot to me, and hopefully to the recipients of the loans I provide.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to help others. And, I hope my Mom would be proud that I do this.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: helping people is good : )
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate an internship program for students from Korea

lender.name: Chaz French
lender.loan_because: I care about the world around me. I want others to have better lives, and Kiva gives me the chance help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
Professional Cook, Smartass, SuperFag.
I write about food, travel, politics, art, music and fashion on my website.

lender.name: Ivy
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my baby.

lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help others build their businesses and become self sustainable
lender.occupational_info: I build monitoring and evaluation systems for development projects in health, education and the human and social development sector

lender.name: Brian Estes
lender.loan_because: It's the right think to do.
lender.occupational_info: I write programs for computers. Recently, I've started reviewing little projectors, called pico projectors.

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: "Service... Giving what you don't have to give. Giving when you don't need to give. Giving because you want to give." - Damien Hess
lender.occupational_info: I go to school as a college student at UCSD to hopefully become a pharmacist and help more people! Yay :D

lender.name: Sheppard Family
lender.loan_because: We are a typical Aussie family, mum and dad and 4 kids. We live in Victoria Australia and are very lucky to have our lifestyle and opportunities. This concept is a great way for us to share with others who are trying to build a better life.

lender.name: nodeposit
lender.occupational_info: Find a listing of no deposit online casinos. You may ask yourself why and how can online casinos afford to give players free bonus money with no deposit required.

lender.name: Tess
lender.loan_because: I am a very privileged person and I want to share that how I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying biology. I want to become a scientific researcher, at the moment cancer research interests me, but I'm not sure what I'll end up doing.

lender.name: Fat Rabbit Bank
lender.loan_because: i can lend money while i am growing up and later that can help pay for me to study and learn

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I know how empowering it is start and grow a business and how encouraging it is to get some support. Everyone who has ever achieved in this world has done so with a combination of luck, timing and help from others in addition to their own abilities. The world is my community.
lender.occupational_info: I make books, except that my books are actually a deck of cards. They are guides to restaurants and bars etc for cities around the world. I also make iPhone application versions of them.

lender.name: Munim Siddiqui
lender.loan_because: Want to help who is willing to work

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I know my modest contribution is just like a small drop in the ocean, but together, we can make a huge difference in people's lives. And to be able to see how these people grow and progress makes this whole experience so much more enriching and personal.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a cardiac and thoracic surgery nurse. It's always fast pace and never boring...

lender.name: Ummo
lender.loan_because: I believe in Micro Credit
lender.occupational_info: Transport of goods via railways
